I'm currently doing a research about the Sengoku period. I need some more i=
nformation about this

Motonari become his vassal before he passed away. How did Yoshiaki did that=
? Was it because the Mori too weak at that time?=A0

I'm looking forward to=
 seeing your answers. Thank you in advance!
